name: Golden Companion Spirit
description: Used to exchange for a 5-star character at the Stellar Convergence shop.
story: "Even the tiniest speck of dust, drawn by the call of exploration, can gather into a dazzling golden nova."

source.description: Redeemable after obtaining a duplicate of a 5-star character with maxed Eidolons twice
